description.raw:
The last `true` in `findFile` tells it to use custom find file callbacks, which means we can use, for example, Fuel to find the file. The rest of the logic is making so we can get an SDF file from a directory containing `model.config`.

To try it out:

1. `ign gazebo -v 4 empty.sdf`


1. `ign service -s /world/empty/create --reqtype ignition.msgs.EntityFactory --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 300 --req 'sdf_filename: "https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/1.0/openrobotics/models/Double pendulum with base/"'`

This will be handy for the GUI to spawn Fuel models.

The last true in findFile tells it to use custom find file callbacks, which means we can use, for example, Fuel to find the file. The rest of the logic is making so we can get an SDF file from a directory containing model.config.

To try it out:

  1. ign gazebo -v 4 empty.sdf

  2. ign service -s /world/empty/create --reqtype ignition.msgs.EntityFactory --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 300 --req 'sdf_filename: "https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/1.0/openrobotics/models/Double pendulum with base/"'

This will be handy for the GUI to spawn Fuel models.

title.raw: Use custom callbacks when reading file (support Fuel URIs)
title.html: Use custom callbacks when reading file (support Fuel URIs)
